Object placement¶

The world of MATRXS can contain a various amount of objects. Below such object classes can be found.

matrxs.objects.env_object.EnvObject(…[, …])

The basic class for all objects in the world.

matrxs.objects.simple_objects.Wall(location)

A class representing the wall object.

matrxs.objects.simple_objects.Door(location, …)

A class representing the door object.

matrxs.objects.simple_objects.SquareBlock(…)

A simple object class.

matrxs.objects.simple_objects.AreaTile(location)

A class representing the area tile object.

matrxs.objects.simple_objects.SmokeTile(location)

A class representing a smoke tile object.

matrxs.objects.agent_body.AgentBody(…)

The class representing the agent body.

matrxs.objects.advanced_objects.Battery(location)

The class used to represent a battery
